array.string:
Get the item at `index` from the `lines` array:\ `let line = lines[index]`
Get the item at `index` from the `illustrations` array:\ `let emoji = illustrations[index]`

dict.string:
### O frabjous day! Callooh! Callay!
**Challenge:** Write your own nonsense poem (replacing `lines`), and illustrate it with emoji (replacing `illustrations`).
[**Next Page**](@next)
